name: google-maps-geolocation-example-master
description: A simple example on how to track user position with [Geolocation API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Geolocation/Using_geolocation) and display it on a map with [Google Maps Javascript API](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/). Checkout the demo [here](https://google-maps-geolocation.bitballoon.com/).
author: RAVI
